name: is-empty-string
description: Check if a value at a specified path is an empty string (exactly "")

input.description: Any JSON object containing a field at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the field to check (e.g., 'user.name', 'data.text')

output.description: true if value at path is exactly empty string "", false for any other value (whitespace, null, false, 0, [], {}, missing field, or non-string type)

examples.description: Check if name field is empty string
Null value is not empty string
